title: Sergio Garcia Busto
text: I am a computational biologist and biochemist that is passionate about biotechnological innovation. I find applying statistical and machine learning concepts to create solutions in the life sciences extremely motivating, in particular at the interface between AI and engineering biology. I am pursuing a PhD at the University of Cambridge and the Wellcome Sanger Institute, also working closely with Harvard Medical School, and am currently working on AI methods for enzyme design.
